# Spark of Creation (Trait)
## Overview
**Spark of Creation**: You have always had a knack for making useful things, and your talent as an artisan was evident even at an early age. You gain a +1 trait bonus on [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] checks, and the cost of creating magic items is reduced by 5%.

**Source:** Champions of Purity, pg. 11
